name: Search_Taxi

pick_up_place_id.description: The pick up location's place id. pick_up_place_id can be retrieved from api/v1/taxi/searchLocation(Taxi Search Location) endpoint in Taxi collection as googlePlaceId.

drop_off_place_id.description: The drop off location's place id. drop_off_place_id can be retrieved from api/v1/taxi/searchLocation(Taxi Search Location) endpoint in Taxi collection as googlePlaceId.

pick_up_time.description:
Pick up time
Format: HH:MM
Note: The format of time is 24 hours.

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.

languagecode.description:
To obtain the response data in a specific language, enter the languagecode. languagecode can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLanguages(Get Languages
) endpoint in Meta collection.

pick_up_place_id.description: The pick up location's place id. pick_up_place_id can be retrieved from api/v1/taxi/searchLocation(Taxi Search Location) endpoint in Taxi collection as googlePlaceId.

drop_off_place_id.description: The drop off location's place id. drop_off_place_id can be retrieved from api/v1/taxi/searchLocation(Taxi Search Location) endpoint in Taxi collection as googlePlaceId.

Pick up time
Format: HH:MM
Note: The format of time is 24 hours.

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.

dropOffLocation.description: Apollo Bandar, Colaba, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400001, India
dropOffLocation.name: The Taj Mahal Palace, Mumbai, Apollo Bandar, Colaba, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400001, India

pickupLocation.name: Chhatrapati Shivaji International Airport (BOM), Mumbai, Maharashtra 400099, India

results.descriptionLocalised: Perfect for solo travellers, couples and small families.
Plenty of space to travel in comfort.

response_summary:
Here’s a summary of the available transportation options from Chhatrapati Shivaji International Airport (BOM) to The Taj Mahal Palace in Mumbai on June 15, 2025, at 2:30 PM.  

There are three vehicle options provided by E-Life Limo, all offering a meet-and-greet service and taking approximately 51 minutes to cover the 29.12 km distance.  

The **Standard** option costs $19.58 and accommodates up to 3 passengers with space for 3 bags, making it ideal for solo travelers, couples, or small families.  

For larger groups, the **People Carrier** is available at $24.17, seating 4 passengers and carrying 4 bags, which is a great choice for families.  

If you prefer more comfort, the **Executive** option is priced at $27.50, providing extra space for 3 passengers and 3 bags.  

All bookings are refundable, with a cancellation policy allowing changes up to 24 hours before the scheduled pickup. No discounts are currently applied to these options.
enhance_func_desc: This API is ideal for travelers needing airport transfers or intercity rides. It searches taxi options between two locations, providing details like vehicle type, pricing, capacity, and estimated travel time. Users receive options sorted by price or comfort, with refundable bookings and flexible cancellation policies. The pickup and drop-off place IDs must be obtained from the Taxi Search Location API.

enhanced_parameters.pick_up_place_id: Unique identifier for the pickup location, sourced from Taxi Search Location API.
enhanced_parameters.drop_off_place_id: Unique identifier for the drop-off location, sourced from Taxi Search Location API.
enhanced_parameters.pick_up_date: Scheduled date for the taxi pickup in YYYY-MM-DD format.
enhanced_parameters.pick_up_time: Scheduled time for the taxi pickup in 24-hour HH:MM format.
enhanced_parameters.currency_code: Currency for displaying taxi pricing information.
enhanced_parameters.languagecode: Language preference for the response data.

journeys.description: List of journey details including pickup and drop-off locations

requestedPickupDateTime.description: The scheduled pickup date and time in ISO 8601 format

city.description: City where the drop-off location is situated

latLng.description: Geographical coordinates of the drop-off location

latitude.description: Latitude coordinate of the drop-off location

longitude.description: Longitude coordinate of the drop-off location

description.description: Human-readable description of the drop-off location

country.description: Country code of the drop-off location

isRideNowAvailable.description: Indicates if ride-now service is available at the drop-off location

name.description: Full name of the drop-off location

locationType.description: Type of the drop-off location (e.g., GEO, AIRPORT)

postcode.description: Postal code of the drop-off location

airportCode.description: Airport code if the drop-off location is an airport, otherwise null

establishment.description: Name of the establishment at the drop-off location

locationId.description: Unique identifier for the drop-off location
